name: Lazarus: Magi of the Stars
description:
This is a RPG maker game inspired by the likes of Renryuu: Ascension and Zombies retreat. Feedback and suggestions are welcome, this project is still in development and I'll be working on it in my free time so support if you can I'll try to update once a month depending on how my school schedule is. 

This is a Story about or protagonist Lazarus assuming the role of a king and finding out his origins.
